mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEST01_REPLY(REPLY_SEQ, ID, CONTENT, REF, STEP, DEPTH, WDATE, DEL, FOOD_SEQ ) VALUES(SEQ_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{content}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(REF), 0)+1 FROM TEST01_REPLY), 0, 0, SYSDATE, 0, #{food_seq} )
